title: Shohidul Islam
text:
Shohidul Islam (born 5 January 1995) is a Bangladeshi <a href="cricket">cricket</a>er who plays for <a href="Dhaka%20Metropolis%20cricket%20team">Dhaka Metropolis</a>. He made his international debut for the <a href="Bangladesh%20national%20cricket%20team">Bangladesh cricket team</a> in November 2021.
Domestic career.
He made his <a href="Twenty20">Twenty20</a> (T20) debut on 21 November 2016 playing for <a href="Chittagong%20Vikings">Chittagong Vikings</a> in the <a href="2016%E2%80%9317%20Bangladesh%20Premier%20League">2016–17 Bangladesh Premier League</a>. In November 2018, bowling for <a href="Central%20Zone%20cricket%20team%20%28Bangladesh%29">Central Zone</a> in the <a href="2018%E2%80%9319%20Bangladesh%20Cricket%20League">2018–19 Bangladesh Cricket League</a>, he took his maiden five-wicket haul in first-class cricket. He was the leading wicket-taker for Central Zone in the tournament, with eighteen dismissals in four matches. In August 2019, he was one of 35 cricketers named in a training camp ahead of Bangladesh's 2019–20 season. In November 2019, he was selected to play for the <a href="Khulna%20Tigers">Khulna Tigers</a> in the <a href="2019%E2%80%9320%20Bangladesh%20Premier%20League">2019–20 Bangladesh Premier League</a>.
In March 2021, in the opening round of the <a href="2020%E2%80%9321%20National%20Cricket%20League">2020–21 National Cricket League</a>, he scored his maiden century in first-class cricket, with 106 runs for Dhaka Metropolis.
International career.
In April 2021, he was named in Bangladesh's preliminary <a href="Test%20cricket">Test</a> squad for their away series <a href="Bangladeshi%20cricket%20team%20in%20Sri%20Lanka%20in%202020%E2%80%9321">against Sri Lanka</a>. In May 2021, Shohidul was named in Bangladesh's preliminary <a href="One%20Day%20International">One Day International</a> (ODI) squad for their home series <a href="Sri%20Lankan%20cricket%20team%20in%20Bangladesh%20in%202021">against Sri Lanka</a>.
In November 2021, he was named in Bangladesh's <a href="Twenty20%20International">Twenty20 International</a> (T20I) squad for their series <a href="Pakistani%20cricket%20team%20in%20Bangladesh%20in%202021%E2%80%9322">against Pakistan</a>. He made his T20I debut on 22 November 2021, for Bangladesh against <a href="Pakistan%20national%20cricket%20team">Pakistan</a>. Later the same month, he was added to Bangladesh's <a href="Test%20cricket">Test</a> squad, also for their series against Pakistan. He was also named in Bangladesh's Test squad for their series <a href="Bangladeshi%20cricket%20team%20in%20New%20Zealand%20in%202021%E2%80%9322">against New Zealand</a>.
